get.description: Get list of veterinary practices (public endpoint)

parameters.name: accepting_patients

schema.description: Filter to practices accepting new patients
schema.title: Accepting Patients

parameters.description: Filter to practices accepting new patients

schema.title: Response Get Practices Api V1 Practices  Get

get.description: Get a specific practice by ID (public endpoint)
List pet owners based on user permissions (Admin: all, Vet: only their practice's patients)

schema.title: Response Get Pet Owners Api V1 Pet Owners  Get

post.description: Create a new pet owner (Admin and Vet Staff can create pet owners)

get.description: Get details of a specific pet owner (Admin | Vet with practice association)

put.description: Update an existing pet owner (Admin can update any, VET_STAFF can update their practice's pet owners)

post.description: Create a new association between pet owner and practice

get.description: Get associations for a practice

schema.title: Response Get Associations For Practice Api V1 Associations Practice  Practice Id  Get

get.description: Get associations for a pet owner

schema.title: Response Get Associations For Pet Owner Api V1 Associations Pet Owner  Pet Owner Id  Get

put.description: Update an association (Admin can update any, VET_STAFF can update their practice's associations)

delete.description: Delete an association (Admin can delete any, VET_STAFF can delete their practice's associations)

put.description: Approve an association request (Admin or Practice staff only)

get.description: List all pets (Admin only)
List pets by owner (Admin | Owner | Associated Vet)

schema.title: Response List Pets By Owner Api V1 Pets Owner  Owner Uuid  Get

get.description: View single pet (Admin | Owner | Associated Vet)

post.description: Reactivate a deactivated pet (Admin | VET_STAFF | Pet Owner)

get.description: List all medical records for a pet (Admin | Pet Owner | Associated Vet)
View single medical record (Admin | Pet Owner | Associated Vet)

put.description: Update medical record (Admin | Creating Vet only) - Creates new version

post.description: Create medical record (Vet or Admin only)

get.description: Get medical record timeline for a pet (Admin | Pet Owner | Associated Vet)
Get all follow-ups due (Vet Staff and Admin only)
Get complete medical record history for a pet (Admin | Pet Owner | Associated Vet)

List all visit transcripts for a pet
Access: Admin | Pet Owner | Associated Vet

schema.title: Response List Pet Visit Transcripts Api V1 Visit Transcripts Pet  Pet Uuid  Get

Get all visits for an appointment, optionally filtered by pet

Delete visit transcript

Create visit transcript

Create appointment
